:wave: Hi <@{user}>! we're happy *you're here!* :wave:

We'd like to get to know you *a little bit better*. :hugging_face:
Please *press the button* to add your *skill set*, which will be automatically posted to #introductions
It will also notify our onboarding crew that you joined and they *will reach out* to help you find *the right project* :rocket:

:fire: *Critical first steps for every new member*
1. Add your profession or main skill to your Slack profile (click on <@{user}> in the top left).
2. Ask for help anywhere, especially from moderators :moderator:.
